description:
Saito and Tiffa are able to escape the land of the elves thanks to the efforts of Lukshana, and her uncle. These helpers are now considered as traitors who have sided with a void mage, Tiffa. Saito also became Tiffa`s familiar when they kissed. Meanwhile, Louise concentrates on her desire to meet Saito, and vice-versa. That causes a large magic hole to open, which is the escape route and Saito hugs Louise.
Source: Wiki
